content: stroller blankie colorful stripes in garter stitch give this baby blanket cheer and warmth while the pattern looks complicated every row is the same simple knit-purl sequence the fun is in the selection of colors for the stripe i chose five rainbow colors you re welcome to use more or fewer finished measurements 28 width x 24 gauge 22 sts/4 & 40 row/4 in broken garter stitch on #5 materials berroco corsica 1 skein ea a pink 3642 b peach 3615 c mint 3624 d ice blue 3620 e lilac 3619 us# 5 needle 24 circular and us #7 for bind off pattern stitch broken rib pattern over a multiple of 8 stitches +4 row 1 *knit 4 purl 4* repeat * to* to last 4 stitches knit 4 knitting with color a cast on 148 stitches work two row in pattern stitch attach color b work two row in pattern stitch carrying the color not in use up the edge when 10 ridges of color a have been complete half skein used disconnect that skein set aside and replace in stripe pattern with color c when color b runs out replace with color d when color c runs out replace with color e when color d runs out replace with the reserved color a bind off in knit with color a using larger needle to achieve a flat edge that matches your cast on *note for more finished edges slip the last stitch of every row as if to purl with the yarn in front **much more inspiration can be found in sequence knitting by cecelia campochiaro © copyright 2016 - andra asars
